amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that all countries that hold debt from the former Iraqi regime of Saddam Hussein should be urged to forgive their debt.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1876 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 388.

action.text: Amendment SA 1876 proposed by Senator Nickles. (consideration: CR 10/17/2003 S12683-12688, S12708-12709; text: CR 10/17/2003 S12683) To express the sense of the Senate that all countries that hold debt from the former Iraqi regime of Saddam Hussein should be urged to forgive their debt.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1876 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 388.
